description.text: The root directory for all project files.

shortDescription.text: Low severity - CloudWatch log group not encrypted with managed key

help.text:
The issue is... 
Log group is not encrypted with customer managed key

 The impact of this is... 
 Scope of use of the key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `kms_key_id` attribute with customer managed key id
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
Log group is not encrypted with customer managed key

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Scope of use of the key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `kms_key_id` attribute with customer managed key id

shortDescription.text: Low severity - SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key

help.text:
The issue is... 
SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key

 The impact of this is... 
 Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to a customer managed key id
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to a customer managed key id

shortDescription.text: Medium severity - Non-Encrypted SNS Topic

help.text:
The issue is... 
The SNS topic is not encrypted at rest

 The impact of this is... 
 That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to KMS key
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
The SNS topic is not encrypted at rest

 **The impact of this is...** 
 That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to KMS key

shortDescription.text: Low severity - KMS key does not have key rotation enabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
That your encryption keys are not being rotated by AWS

 The impact of this is... 
 That data is being encrypted with a key which is valid for a longer period of time, resulting in a greater exposure window should that key be leaked

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `enable_key_rotation` attribute to `true`
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
That your encryption keys are not being rotated by AWS

 **The impact of this is...** 
 That data is being encrypted with a key which is valid for a longer period of time, resulting in a greater exposure window should that key be leaked

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `enable_key_rotation` attribute to `true`

shortDescription.text: Low severity - ECR Registry allows mutable tags

help.text:
The issue is... 
The AWS ECR registry does not enforce immutable tags

 The impact of this is... 
 Image tags can be modified post deployment

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `image_tag_mutability` attribute to `IMMUTABLE`
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
The AWS ECR registry does not enforce immutable tags

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Image tags can be modified post deployment

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `image_tag_mutability` attribute to `IMMUTABLE`

shortDescription.text: Low severity - ECR repository is not encrypted with customer managed key

help.text:
The issue is... 
ECR repository is not encrypted with customer managed key

 The impact of this is... 
 Scope of use of the key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `encryption_configuration.kms_key` attribute to customer managed KMS key
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
ECR repository is not encrypted with customer managed key

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Scope of use of the key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `encryption_configuration.kms_key` attribute to customer managed KMS key

shortDescription.text: Low severity - Secrets Manager is not encrypted with customer managed key

help.text:
The issue is... 
Secrets Manager is not encrypted with customer managed key

 The impact of this is... 
 Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `kms_key_id` attribute to customer managed key id
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
Secrets Manager is not encrypted with customer managed key

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `kms_key_id` attribute to customer managed key id

shortDescription.text: Low severity - Rule allows open egress

help.text:
The issue is... 
The security group rule allows open egress

 The impact of this is... 
 Open egress can be used to exfiltrate data to unauthorized destinations, and enable access to potentially malicious resources

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `cidr_blocks` attribute to specific ranges e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
The security group rule allows open egress

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Open egress can be used to exfiltrate data to unauthorized destinations, and enable access to potentially malicious resources

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `cidr_blocks` attribute to specific ranges e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

shortDescription.text: High severity - S3 restrict public bucket control is disabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
Bucket will recognize public policies and allow public access

 The impact of this is... 
 If public policy is attached to the bucket, anyone will be able to read and/or write to the bucket.

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` `restrict_public_buckets` attribute to `true`, or use default
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
Bucket will recognize public policies and allow public access

 **The impact of this is...** 
 If public policy is attached to the bucket, anyone will be able to read and/or write to the bucket.

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` `restrict_public_buckets` attribute to `true`, or use default

shortDescription.text: Low severity - S3 bucket MFA delete control disabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
S3 bucket will not enforce MFA login on delete requests

 The impact of this is... 
 Object could be deleted without stronger MFA authorization

 You can resolve this by... 
Follow instructions in `https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/MultiFactorAuthenticationDelete.html` to manually configure the MFA setting. For AWS provider < v4.0.0 set `versioning.mfa_delete` attribute to `true` in aws_s3_bucket resource. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0 set 'versioning_configuration.mfa_delete` attribute to `Enabled`. The terraform change is required to reflect the setting in the state file
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
S3 bucket will not enforce MFA login on delete requests

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Object could be deleted without stronger MFA authorization

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Follow instructions in `https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/MultiFactorAuthenticationDelete.html` to manually configure the MFA setting. For AWS provider < v4.0.0 set `versioning.mfa_delete` attribute to `true` in aws_s3_bucket resource. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0 set 'versioning_configuration.mfa_delete` attribute to `Enabled`. The terraform change is required to reflect the setting in the state file

shortDescription.text: High severity - S3 block public ACLs control is disabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
Bucket does not prevent creation of public ACLs

 The impact of this is... 
 Anyone who can manage bucket's ACLs will be able to grant public access to the bucket

 You can resolve this by... 
Set the `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` `block_public_acls` field to `true` or use the default setting
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
Bucket does not prevent creation of public ACLs

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Anyone who can manage bucket's ACLs will be able to grant public access to the bucket

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set the `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` `block_public_acls` field to `true` or use the default setting

shortDescription.text: High severity - S3 ignore public ACLs control is disabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
Bucket will recognize public ACLs and allow public access

 The impact of this is... 
 If public ACL is attached to the bucket, anyone will be able to read and/or write to the bucket.

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` `ignore_public_acls` attribute to `true`, or use default
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
Bucket will recognize public ACLs and allow public access

 **The impact of this is...** 
 If public ACL is attached to the bucket, anyone will be able to read and/or write to the bucket.

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` `ignore_public_acls` attribute to `true`, or use default

shortDescription.text: High severity - S3 block public policy control is disabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
Bucket does not prevent creation of public policies

 The impact of this is... 
 Anyone who can manage bucket's policies will be able to grant public access to the bucket.

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` `block_public_policy` attribute to `true`, or use default
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
Bucket does not prevent creation of public policies

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Anyone who can manage bucket's policies will be able to grant public access to the bucket.

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` `block_public_policy` attribute to `true`, or use default

shortDescription.text: Low severity - S3 bucket versioning disabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
S3 bucket versioning is disabled

 The impact of this is... 
 Changes or deletion of objects will not be reversible

 You can resolve this by... 
For AWS provider < v4.0.0, set `versioning.enabled` attribute to `true`. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add aws_s3_bucket_versioning resource.
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
S3 bucket versioning is disabled

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Changes or deletion of objects will not be reversible

 **You can resolve this by...** 
For AWS provider < v4.0.0, set `versioning.enabled` attribute to `true`. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add aws_s3_bucket_versioning resource.

shortDescription.text: Low severity - X-ray tracing is disabled for Lambda function

help.text:
The issue is... 
Amazon X-Ray tracing is not enabled for Lambda function

 The impact of this is... 
 Trace logs will not be available during investigation

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `tracing_config.mode` attribute to `Active` or `PassThrough`
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
Amazon X-Ray tracing is not enabled for Lambda function

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Trace logs will not be available during investigation

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `tracing_config.mode` attribute to `Active` or `PassThrough`

shortDescription.text: Low severity - MQ broker general logs are disabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
Amazon MQ Broker logging is disabled

 The impact of this is... 
 Audit records may not be available during investigation

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `logs.general` attribute to `true`
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
Amazon MQ Broker logging is disabled

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Audit records may not be available during investigation

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `logs.general` attribute to `true`

shortDescription.text: Low severity - DynamoDB not encrypted with customer managed key

help.text:
The issue is... 
DynamoDB table is not encrypted with customer managed KMS key

 The impact of this is... 
 Scope of use of the key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `server_side_encryption.kms_key_arn` attribute to customer managed key ARN
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
DynamoDB table is not encrypted with customer managed KMS key

 **The impact of this is...** 
 Scope of use of the key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `server_side_encryption.kms_key_arn` attribute to customer managed key ARN

shortDescription.text: Medium severity - Non-Encrypted Kinesis Stream

help.text:
The issue is... 
The AWS kinesis server-side encryption is disabled

 The impact of this is... 
 That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `encryption_type` attribute to `KMS`
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
The AWS kinesis server-side encryption is disabled

 **The impact of this is...** 
 That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `encryption_type` attribute to `KMS`

shortDescription.text: Medium severity - DynamoDB point-in-time recovery disabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
DynamoDB does not have Point-in-Time Recovery enabled

 The impact of this is... 
 No automated backups of DynamoDB data

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `point_in_time_recovery.enabled` attribute to `true`
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
DynamoDB does not have Point-in-Time Recovery enabled

 **The impact of this is...** 
 No automated backups of DynamoDB data

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `point_in_time_recovery.enabled` attribute to `true`

shortDescription.text: Medium severity - Non-encrypted EFS at rest

help.text:
The issue is... 
EFS system file is not encrypted

 The impact of this is... 
 That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `encrypted` attribute to `true`.
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
EFS system file is not encrypted

 **The impact of this is...** 
 That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `encrypted` attribute to `true`.

shortDescription.text: Low severity - ECR image scanning is disabled

help.text:
The issue is... 
The ECR image scan for known vulnerabilities is disabled

 The impact of this is... 
 The known vulnerabilities will not be automatically discovered

 You can resolve this by... 
Set `image_scanning_configuration.scan_on_push` attribute to `true`
help.markdown:
**The issue is...** 
The ECR image scan for known vulnerabilities is disabled

 **The impact of this is...** 
 The known vulnerabilities will not be automatically discovered

 **You can resolve this by...** 
Set `image_scanning_configuration.scan_on_push` attribute to `true`
